short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This second by second clock keeps you updated in real-time, showing the current time with every passing second

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Exact Time Clock with Seconds

Always wondering, "What time is it?" This Chrome extension provides an exact time clock with seconds, offering a clear, second-by-second view of the current time. Whether you need a clock to the seconds or simply want a reliable, accurate display, this extension gives you a precise time current, perfect for anyone needing a clock with the seconds right at their fingertips.
